DELIMITED.input_data:
INPUT_DATA = [['header1', 'header2', 'header3'], ['Field11', 'Field12', 'Field13'], ['Field21', 'Field22','Field23']]
	INPUT_DATA_STR = '\n'.join([','.join(line) for line in INPUT_DATA])

if stage_attributes['delimiter_format_type'] == 'CUSTOM':
		f = lambda ip_string: ip_string.format(quote_character=quote_character,
											   delimiter_character=delimiter_character)
		DATA = [[f('{quote_character}Field11{delimiter_character}{quote_character}'), 'Field12',
				 f('{quote_character},Field13{quote_character}')],
				[f('{quote_character}Field{delimiter_character}21{quote_character}'), 'Field22', 'Field23']]
		file_content = '\n'.join([delimiter_character.join(t1) for t1 in DATA])
		EXPECTED_OUTPUT = [OrderedDict([('0', 'Field11^'), ('1', 'Field12'), ('2', ',Field13')]),
						   OrderedDict([('0', 'Field^21'), ('1', 'Field22'), ('2', 'Field23')])]
	else:
		f = lambda ip_string: ip_string.format(quote_character=quote_character,
											   multi_character_field_delimiter=multi_character_field_delimiter)
		DATA = [[f('{quote_character}Field11{multi_character_field_delimiter}{quote_character}'), 'Field12',
				 f('{quote_character},Field13{quote_character}')],
				[f('{quote_character}Field{multi_character_field_delimiter}21{quote_character}'), 'Field22', 'Field23']]
		file_content = '\n'.join([multi_character_field_delimiter.join(t1) for t1 in DATA])
		EXPECTED_OUTPUT = [OrderedDict([('0', 'Field11||'), ('1', 'Field12'), ('2', ',Field13')]),
						   OrderedDict([('0', 'Field||21'), ('1', 'Field22'), ('2', 'Field23')])]
